name: Mount Robson Inn

reviews.title: Night in Jasper
reviews.text: We were a family of 4 adults travelling through Western Canada in our hire car and had booked two rooms in the Mount Robson Inn in Jasper through Expedia. The Mount Robson Inn seemed a little expensive, but then all accommodation in Jasper seems to be pricy and hard to get in early July. We stayed for one night.

reviews.title: Looks may be deceiving
reviews.text: The hotel was easy to find and the hotel is built on 2 levels around a square courtyard with plenty of parking. The reception staff were pleasant and had booked us two adjoining rooms as requested on the upper level. Our rooms on the upper level faced towards the mountains if you stood outside the door.

description: A convenient location and complimentary breakfast makes the Mount Robson Inn a preferred accommodation choice in Jasper. The ideal location of the hotel, at the south end of Jasper’s Main Street, provides a quieter setting and proximity to walk downtown while enjoying the surrounding mountain views. The hotel’s 80 rooms are recently updated and well appointed. The variety of rooms and suites at the Mount Robson Inn range from Jacuzzi suites to family suites with mountain views, as well as multi-bedroom suites each with fridge, microwave and complimentary wi-fi. Guests enjoy the onsite outdoor hot tubs, ample parking, ski and bike storage and the convenience of being on the shuttle route.
